content:
Sure, here is the list of outstanding strategists for you, prioritized based on their relevance and influence in social media marketing:

1. Gary Vaynerchuk
2. Neil Patel
3. Jay Baer
4. Mari Smith
5. Julian Cole
6. Matt Navarra
7. Andrew Hutchinson
8. Amy Porterfield

I recommend starting with Gary Vaynerchuk, Neil Patel, and Jay Baer as they are considered some of the most influential and experienced digital marketing experts in the industry. They have a wealth of experience and have produced a variety of resources, such as books, articles, podcasts, and videos, that can provide insights and strategies for developing a successful social media strategy.

Mari Smith and Julian Cole are also highly regarded as social media experts and can provide valuable insights and examples for developing a social media strategy. Matt Navarra, Andrew Hutchinson, and Amy Porterfield are also important names to consider, especially if you're looking for more specific insights or case studies related to your particular industry or niche.

Remember, though, that there is no one-size-fits-all approach to social media marketing. Your social media strategy should be unique to your brand and target audience. Use these experts as a starting point to inform and inspire your strategy, but always keep your unique goals and challenges in mind.
